sentences.en: An open mind, a cheerful disposition, enterprising spirit and a bountiful harvest.
sentences.cn: 开放的心态, 快乐的心情, 进取得精神,丰富的收获.

sentences.en: But the dream of a bountiful West Coast urged the Joads onward.
sentences.cn: 然而,对富饶的西海岸的梦想激励着乔德一家继续前进.

sentences.en: But the harvest of 1621 was a bountiful one.
sentences.cn: 但1621年他们获得了大丰收.

sentences.en: He, he took a bus to Bountiful . You have family there, right?
sentences.cn: 他坐车去了Bountiful. 你在那有家, 不是 么 ?

sentences.en: Here the mountain scenery is beautiful and aquatic product resources are bountiful.
sentences.cn: 这里山区风光迷人,水产资源丰富.

sentences.en: I do not believe that Nature is limitlessly bountiful.
sentences.cn: 我认为自然界并非无限富足.

sentences.en: In her later years she became a lady bountiful.
sentences.cn: 她晚年时成了一位女慈善家.

sentences.en: Incentives can raise productivity and offer bountiful opportunities for a better life.
sentences.cn: 奖励能够提高生产力,并为更好的生活创造大量机会.

sentences.en: More bountiful crops of corn, squash, cotton, and beans could be obtained.
sentences.cn: 这里玉米 、 南瓜 、 棉花和豆类的收成较好.
她想:大自然是慷慨 、 宽厚的.

sentences.en: She distributed gifts in a bountiful and gracious manner.
sentences.cn: 他亲切而又慷慨地分发礼物.

sentences.en: The vile person shall be no more called liberal , nor the churl said to be bountiful.
sentences.cn: 愚顽人不再称为高明 、 吝啬人不再称为大方.

sentences.en: We found a bountiful supply of coconuts on the island.
sentences.cn: 我们发现岛上有充足的椰子供应.

words.tran_cn: 发给…奖金等；为…而发给赏金

trans.tran_cn: 慷慨给予的，丰富的，充裕的
trans.tran_en: if something is bountiful, there is more than enough of it
